Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HoundsAndHare, Othello, TicTacToe

    public abstract class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Game is an Abstract class that the subclasses will extend in order to provide implementation of the abstract methods provided.
    Since:
    October 14, 2014
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Jeton Sinoimeri 100875046
    See Also:
